Title: Relates to raising to civil jurisdictional limits
Summary: Raises the civil jurisdictional limits to $10,000 for small claims.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Amd ยง1801, NYC Civ Ct Act; amd ยง1801, UDCA; amd ยง1801, UCCA; amd ยง1801, UJCA
